en: Facing Fate
trans: 面对命运

en: As Clarisse waits for a client with the rest of the  crew, she reads a letter from home... and then she rips it to shreds and brushes off Lyria's obvious concern. Suddenly the client appears with soldiers in pursuit.
trans: 当Clarisse在骑车团的其余部分等待客户的时候，她在家里读了一封信……然后她将它撕成碎片，刷掉露莉亚的明显担忧。突然，客户出现了追击士兵。

en: 姬塔 and company are waiting for their client on a street corner one night.
trans: 一天夜里，姬塔和同伴在街角等候委托人。

en: Clarisse is reading a letter, assisted by a dim lamp.
trans: 克拉莉丝在借着昏暗的灯光读一封信。

en: Sigh...
What's wrong, Clarisse? I hardly ever hear you sigh like that.
trans: 怎么了，克拉莉丝小姐？很少见你这样叹气。

en: Huh? Oh... It's nothing! Nothing at all!
trans: 额？额……什么事都没有哦☆。

en: Clarisse smiles and rips the letter apart.
trans: 说完，克拉莉丝笑着将手中的信件撕掉了。

en: Hey! Wasn't that a letter? You didn't have to rip it up...
trans: 嘿!那是封信吧？撕掉没问题吗？

en: Don't worry about it! It was just complaints from back home!
trans: 别担心啦☆！里面只有些家人间的唠叨！

en: So it was a letter from your family? But that's even more reason to—
trans: 所以那是你家人写的信吗？既然这样的话……

en: It's fine! More importantly, has the... um... client gotten here yet?
trans: 没关系啦！所以，比起来，有……嗯……委托人到了吗？

en: Nah... I don't see anyone yet.
trans: 没……这里根本看不到人影。

en: Not that I can really see anything in this darkness...
trans: 说起来..这么暗根本什么东西都看不到嘛……

en: It does seem a little odd to set up this meeting in the middle of the night.
trans: 特意要求在深夜会面，总感觉怪怪的。

en: So, Lyria. What kind of mission is this anyway?
trans: 所以，露莉亚酱。这次的委托是什么样的呢？

en: Um... The client said she wants us to protect her, or something like that.
trans: 嗯……是这样……委托人说她希望我们保护她……或者类似的工作。

en: So we're bodyguards then. But why meet us so late? I'm getting sleepy.
trans: 那么我们这次就是护卫的工作了。只是为什么要挑这个时间……好困啊……

en: Don't look now, Vyrn, but I don't think this is any time to sleep!
trans: 等一下，碧君碧君，现在可不是睡觉的时候！

en: Why? Did our client finally come?
trans: 怎么了？我们的委托人来了吗？

en: Looks like it! And she brought some friends!
trans: 看上去是的！好像还带来了一些朋友！

en: Friends?
trans: 朋友？

en: Excuse me! You're the skyfarers I hired, right?
trans: 打扰一下！你们就是接受委托的的骑空团吧？

en: That's right! It sure looks like you're in a hurry...
trans: 没错！那个..为什么你看起来这么慌张……

en: Huh? What's that? What's going on?
trans: 咦？那是什么？怎么回事？

en: Here they come! And it's a big group too!
trans: 他们来了☆！好像还是挺多！

en: Ugh... Who are those guys? Agents?
trans: 呃……那些家伙是什么人？佣兵？

en: All right, everyone... Looks like we're up.
trans: 好吧，各位……看起来我们要开始工作啦☆。
